Help Us Build the Future
of Warranty Tracking

Join our team and make protecting purchases simple for millions

Why HavenKeep?

We're a small, focused team solving a real problem that affects millions of people. Everyone loses warranties. Everyone wishes tracking them was easier. We're building the solution, and we need talented people who care about making everyday life simpler.

Customer Obsessed

We start with the customer and work backwards. Every decision we make is guided by how it helps our users.

Move Fast, Think Deep

We ship quickly but think deeply about the problems we're solving. Speed without direction is just chaos.

Own It

We take ownership of our work and our mistakes. No blame, just learning and improving.

Build for the Long Term

We're building a company and product that will last. No shortcuts, no technical debt we can't pay back.

Our Hiring Process

1

Apply

Send us your resume and a note about why you're interested. We read every application.

2

Initial Call

30-minute chat to get to know each other and discuss the role.

3

Technical/Skills Assessment

A practical exercise relevant to the role. We value your time and keep it focused.

4

Team Interviews

Meet the team you'll be working with. This is as much for you to interview us as for us to interview you.

5

Offer

If it's a match, we'll move quickly with a competitive offer. Welcome to HavenKeep!
